p: From other virus infections, it is known that viral replication can be enhanced during vigorous activity, resulting in greater structural damage of the heart tissue. 29,30 Thus, in the case of an athlete diagnosed with COVID-19, but without any symptoms, we would also recommend refraining from intensive or competitive-like exercise for at least 2 weeks. In the absence of symptoms and abnormalities in the resting ECG at the end of this time period, return to sport can be recommended without restriction.
